data.title: Update Jan 08
data.meta_description: UpdateJan08 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides references to academic papers related to quantitative finance topics such as option pricing, risk modeling, and stochastic processes. Some of the papers referenced include titles on simulation of space-fractional diffusion equations, expected shortfall as an alternative to value at risk, spectral methods for pricing volatility derivatives, and transformation of Markov processes. The references cover a wide range of computational finance techniques and applications.
